content: Have you seen the articles and book by Joe Bower? His website is filled with articles supporting your ideas. Unfortunately, Joe is no longer with us, but his articles on various topics are well worth reading. What troubles me the most is that, like so much other research on effective education, we’ve had this information for years. Yet, with the exception of enlightened teachers like yourself, nothing much changes in our schools. What will it take to create a tipping point?
